title: Preserve the formatting of the command window
body: Pasting the contents of the clipboard loses all formatting - msbuild (and other programs probably) format (colourize) their output which makes them far more readable but only while it's in the command window.

comments.body: Check the "Command Prompt" Properties dialog, "Experimental" tab, "Filter clipboard contents on paste" to see if that's what's breaking it or can fix it for you.  Sure do hope that tab's not going away after the experiment is deemed a success.
